column4: hi looked in google & forums no joy,  done an auto update recently and now have two problems  Error : Opening the cash could not open file /var/cache/apt/srcpkgcache.bin open(13 permission denied)
check the permissions on that file
srcpkgcache.bin is 644 and owned by root
the directory apt is also root-owned and 755
are u trying to install something?
no but i've got a red no entry sign on the top left of my screen
deleted the files does it say to delete the entire directory ?
they're saying remove srcpkgcache.bin and pkgcache.bin, then run sudo aptitude update
yes, but i don't know if that will solve the issue.
now it's 755. When did this issue first crop up?
u did a month's worth of updates? is that right?
